exceptions.tactic: intros A P a H1 H2.
intros A' P a H1 H2.
intros A' P' a H1 H2.
intros A' P' a' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: In environment P, A : stack nat a : nat H : ~ a el sym A H3 : tau1 A = tau2 A Unable to unify "rev (sigma a (gamma A))" with "sigma a (gamma A)".
In environment P, A : stack nat a : nat H : a el sym A -> False H3 : tau1 A = tau2 A Unable to unify "tau1 A = tau2 A" with "palin (sigma a (gamma A))".
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
In environment P, A : stack nat a : nat H : ~ a el sym A H3 : palin (sigma a (gamma A)) Unable to unify "tau2 A" with "tau1 A".
Found no subterm matching "sigma ?M2371 (gamma ?M2372)" in H4.

original: intros A P a H1 H2. unfold not. split. - intros H3. split. + intros x H4. apply H3. rewrite sym_word_R. * rewrite sigma_gamma. rewrite tau1_sym in H4. apply H4. + intros H5. apply H3. rewrite <- sym_word_R. * rewrite sigma_gamma. rewrite tau2_sym. apply H5. - intros H3. split. + unfold palin. intros H4. rewrite sigma_gamma in H4. rewrite tau1_sym. apply H4. + intros H5. unfold palin in *. rewrite <- sigma_gamma in H5. rewrite tau2_sym in H5. apply H5.
